text: Prince Harry and his American girlfriend Meghan Markle took their relationship public on Monday when they were seen together holding hands on the sidelines at 2017 Invictus Games in Toronto. It was the first time the prince, 33, and the actress, 36, were snapped together by photographers, despite being a couple for over a year. The Invictus Games is a Paralympics - style athletic competition that Prince Harry founded for wounded warriors.
